post.body: at this point in my life, I am trying to simplify and get RID of stuff. But I did get a Blackberry Curve :)

Yes, deep discounts are almost impossible to resist!
At least you are TRYING! :) I am learning as well, my husband is the guru= @dwightcook
I think "old fart network " is anyone that doesn't see the benefit of plugging in to new technology.
Hanging with fam, walk/jog at the park, it's 50 degrees in Houston, TX

people send you gift baskets??? I feel so neglected.

yes, go to socialtoo, it's great!
